title: Font ID help with Nokia Siemens Networks logo
content:
Hi, all

I stumbled upon Nokia Siemens Networks logo. Can someone help identify the typeface in the logo? Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20101120182407im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Nokia_Siemens_Networks_logo_4629.gif)
author: metaspace

comments.content: Isn’t that custom by Erik Spiekerman?

Hi

I reckon that it is a modified version of Klavika. The letterforms appear softer, but the makeup of the t appears extremely similar.
I used to work for Siemens. It is a custom proprietary font. I used to have a copy of it, but I've misplaced it.

@dsgoen Thanks for your information.

I hope you can get back the font in a right place one day. Good luck.

Hi ...metaspace ,  
this fount is "Neo® Sans Std Medium"  
i'm working with NokiaSiemensNetworks as Network Engineer in Dubai, UAE.  
bur sorry bro i don't have the fount copy u can buy them or google it.  
Regards.  
TheMothSmoke!
